Question:
Before starting your vehicle, the first thing you should do is:

![](https://as1.ftcdn.net/v2/jpg/05/98/83/68/1000_F_598836831_XdoBdHRi6WR1JOrbvn88CYWp9Qyp2UqB.jpg)
AnswerExplanation:
The answer is:Check seatbelt and mirrors

![](https://as1.ftcdn.net/v2/jpg/05/98/83/68/1000_F_598836831_XdoBdHRi6WR1JOrbvn88CYWp9Qyp2UqB.jpg)

Question:
What is the meaning of a yellow traffic light?

![](https://static.vecteezy.com/system/resources/previews/049/285/997/original/set-of-traffic-light-illustration-vector.jpg)
Answers: Go faster before it turns red

Question:
Motorcyclists must always wear:

![](https://thumbs.dreamstime.com/z/safety-motorcycle-driving-rule-wear-your-helmet-to-protect-your-head-safety-warning-poster-design-safety-motorcycle-driving-rule-235006998.jpg)
AnswerExplanation:
The answer is:Helmet with strap fastened

![](https://thumbs.dreamstime.com/z/safety-motorcycle-driving-rule-wear-your-helmet-to-protect-your-head-safety-warning-poster-design-safety-motorcycle-driving-rule-235006998.jpg)

Question:
Which of the following is unsafe while driving?

![](https://thecinnamonhollow.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/07/The-Dangers-Of-Drinking-And-Driving-580x870.png)
Answers: Driving under the influence of alcohol
Keeping both hands on the steering wheel
AnswerExplanation:
The answer is:Driving under the influence of alcohol

![](https://thecinnamonhollow.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/07/The-Dangers-Of-Drinking-And-Driving-580x870.png)

Question:
Drivers should keep a safe distance because:

![](https://thumbs.dreamstime.com/z/car-safety-rules-illustration-promoting-need-safe-distances-road-to-avoid-collisions-keep-safe-distance-road-344728755.jpg)
Answers: It gives time to react to sudden stops
It annoys the car in front
AnswerExplanation:
The answer is:It gives time to react to sudden stops

![](https://thumbs.dreamstime.com/z/car-safety-rules-illustration-promoting-need-safe-distances-road-to-avoid-collisions-keep-safe-distance-road-344728755.jpg)

Question:
What should you do when driving in rainy conditions?

![](https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/a/aa/Dreaming-About-Rain-Step-14.jpg/v4-460px-Dreaming-About-Rain-Step-14.jpg)
Answers: Speed up to reach home faster
Turn off wipers to save energy
AnswerExplanation:
The answer is:Slow down and use headlights

![](https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/a/aa/Dreaming-About-Rain-Step-14.jpg/v4-460px-Dreaming-About-Rain-Step-14.jpg)

Question:
When approaching a school zone:

![](https://as1.ftcdn.net/v2/jpg/03/57/48/46/1000_F_357484662_DxXE1uCgkrDE7HsC6QBBghKjxxTOI1sL.jpg)
Answers: Slow down and watch for children
AnswerExplanation:
The answer is:Slow down and watch for children

![](https://as1.ftcdn.net/v2/jpg/03/57/48/46/1000_F_357484662_DxXE1uCgkrDE7HsC6QBBghKjxxTOI1sL.jpg)

Question:
If you are sleepy while driving, you should:

![](https://www.shutterstock.com/image-vector/tired-driver-fell-asleep-wheel-600nw-1553644304.jpg)
Answers: Stop and rest at a safe place
AnswerExplanation:
The answer is:Stop and rest at a safe place

![](https://www.shutterstock.com/image-vector/tired-driver-fell-asleep-wheel-600nw-1553644304.jpg)

Question:
When turning at an intersection, you should:

![](https://static.epermittest.com/media/filer_public_thumbnails/filer_public/a7/c7/a7c7623e-b7ba-46b8-a2bd-146572859e97/right-of-way-at-intersections.jpg__1920x0_q100_subsampling-2_upscale.jpg)
Answers: Depend on others to see you
AnswerExplanation:
The answer is:Signal early before turning

![](https://static.epermittest.com/media/filer_public_thumbnails/filer_public/a7/c7/a7c7623e-b7ba-46b8-a2bd-146572859e97/right-of-way-at-intersections.jpg__1920x0_q100_subsampling-2_upscale.jpg)

Question:
Seatbelts are important because they:

![](https://cdn.vectorstock.com/i/500p/78/61/background-with-3d-realistic-unblocked-vector-25667861.jpg)
Answers: Are required only for long trips
AnswerExplanation:
The answer is:Protect all passengers in accidents

![](https://cdn.vectorstock.com/i/500p/78/61/background-with-3d-realistic-unblocked-vector-25667861.jpg)
